entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Makkovik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:13 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Makkovik Airport 12:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -11.2°C
Pressure: 103.1 kPa
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -12.2°C
Wind: SSW 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then increasing to 50 gusting to 80 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
